name: Nightmare In Surance
description:
Nightmare in Surance is a Fast-Paced Top-Down Strategic Serial Killing game.

 In this 80s Synthwave inspired setting, you must make the citizens of Surance fear for their lives again so that they take out life insurance and put some money back in your wallet. You  must plan your route, avoid the cops and get out in your mother's car with as much money as possible; All within 2 minutes! . 

Live your fantasy of being a Serial Killing Health Insurance provider in  

NIGHTMARE     IN        SURANCE

A 2nd Year University project by:

Luke Maloney - Team Leader, Lead UI Design, Lead Narrative Designer

https://lmaloney159.itch.io/

Ethan Morrison - Lead Blueprint Designer, Lead Animator
